title: Make love mystery
content:
Hi,

Is someone knows what is the name of this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/faire_5180.jpg)

Font: 

 Central Avenue Bold 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213107/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: alainch

comments.content:
Try: Central Avenue Bold, Studio Makgill.

[http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/central-avenue/bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213107/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/central-avenue/bold "http://www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/central-avenue/bold")

[Central Avenue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317213107/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/central-avenue/about-font) by StudioMakgill for Colophon.

EDIT: yeah, Dick!

I thinks its a winner!

Thanks DPape and Ryuk!
